org.jsonurl.text

Interface NumberText

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NumberBuilder

    public interface NumberText
    NumberText provides access to a parsed JSON→URL number literal.

    The text of a number is broken down into three parts: integer part, fractional part, and exponent. These parts may be accessed via start and stop indexes into the original parsed text.

    Since:
    2019-09-01
    Author:
    jsonurl.org, David MacCormack

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  NumberText.Exponent
      type of parsed exponent string.

      • isNonFractional

        default boolean isNonFractional()
        Test if this NumberText is a non-fractional number.
        Returns:
        hasIntegerPart() && !hasFractionalPart() && getExponentType() != Exponent.NEGATIVE_VALUE;
